content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- OpenHack MDWH
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

SELECT TOP 1000
	NULL AS RentalSK,
	ren.SourceSystemTransactionID AS TransactionID,
	cust.SourceSystemCustomerID AS CustomerSK,
	ren.SourceSystemID AS LocationSK,
    mov.MovieSK AS MovieSK,
	rendat.DateSK AS RentalDateSK,
	retdat.DateSK AS ReturnDateSK,
	DATEDIFF(d, ren.RentalDate, ren.ReturnDate) AS RentalDuration,
	ren.RentalCost,
	ren.LateFee,
	ren.RentalCost + ren.LateFee AS TotalCost,
	ren.RewindFlag
FROM
	[ext].[rentals] ren
JOIN
	[dbo].[DimDate] rendat
	ON ren.RentalDate = rendat.DateValue
JOIN
	[dbo].[DimDate] retdat
	ON ren.ReturnDate = retdat.DateValue
JOIN
	[ext].[catalog] cat
	ON ren.MovieID = cat.SourceSystemMovieID
JOIN
	[dbo].[DimMovies] mov
	ON cat.Title = mov.MovieTitle
JOIN
	[ext].[customers] cust
	ON ren.CustomerID = cust.SourceSystemCustomerID
